item.title: My story of storing chat logs
item.description: A few years ago I was feeling creative and thought an IRC chat bot would be a great output for my creativity. IRC itself wasn’t really that common anymore, but an up and coming streaming site named twitch.tv was using IRC to run the chat used by thousands of viewers. I started writing on this bot with simple features like the current time or repeating what I would say if I issue the command to do so.

item.title: Why you should think twice about using LastPass
item.description: As a small disclaimer: I am a PHP developer in my day job and I love PHP. This is in no way a criticism of PHP. After creating an account, I wanted to add 2-Factor-Authentication, because losing my LastPass account would equal losing every password of mine.
